mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.subject_id, u.user_id FROM user_subject_relation u WHERE u.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND u.active_flag = 1 AND u.delete_flag = 0;

WITH data_flow_created_by AS ( SELECT u.id, u.student_code, u.birthday, u.fullname, u.email, u.phone, u.grade, u.gender, u.avatar, u.created_date, r.name AS 'role_name', u2.id AS 'created_by_id', u2.fullname AS 'created_fullname', u2.avatar AS 'created_avatar' FROM users u INNER JOIN users u2 ON u.created_by = u2.id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE u.delete_flag = 0 AND u2.delete_flag = 0 AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.active_flag = 1 ), data_flow_last_modified_by AS ( SELECT u.id, u.student_code, u.birthday, u.fullname, u.email, u.phone, u.grade, u.gender, u.avatar, u.created_date, r.name AS 'role_name', u2.id AS 'last_modified_by_id', u2.fullname AS 'last_modified_fullname', u2.avatar AS 'last_modified_avatar' FROM users u INNER JOIN users u2 ON u.last_modified_by = u2.id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE u.delete_flag = 0 AND u2.delete_flag = 0 AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.active_flag = 1 ), cte_user AS ( SELECT data_1.*, data_2.last_modified_by_id, data_2.last_modified_fullname, data_2.last_modified_avatar FROM data_flow_created_by data_1 INNER JOIN data_flow_last_modified_by data_2 ON data_1.id = data_2.id ) SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cte_user cu INNER JOIN user_subject_relation usr ON cu.id = usr.user_id INNER JOIN subject s ON s.id = usr.subject_id WHERE usr.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND usr.active_flag = 1 AND usr.delete_flag = 0 AND s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND ( cu.student_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.birthday LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.fullname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.grade LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.gender LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) -- filter

WITH data_flow_created_by AS ( SELECT u.id, u.student_code, u.birthday, u.fullname, u.email, u.phone, u.grade, u.gender, u.avatar, u.created_date, r.name AS 'role_name', u2.id AS 'created_by_id', u2.fullname AS 'created_fullname', u2.avatar AS 'created_avatar' FROM users u INNER JOIN users u2 ON u.created_by = u2.id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE u.delete_flag = 0 AND u2.delete_flag = 0 AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.active_flag = 1 ), data_flow_last_modified_by AS ( SELECT u.id, u.student_code, u.birthday, u.fullname, u.email, u.phone, u.grade, u.gender, u.avatar, u.created_date, r.name AS 'role_name', u2.id AS 'last_modified_by_id', u2.fullname AS 'last_modified_fullname', u2.avatar AS 'last_modified_avatar' FROM users u INNER JOIN users u2 ON u.last_modified_by = u2.id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE u.delete_flag = 0 AND u2.delete_flag = 0 AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.active_flag = 1 ), cte_user AS ( SELECT data_1.*, data_2.last_modified_by_id, data_2.last_modified_fullname, data_2.last_modified_avatar FROM data_flow_created_by data_1 INNER JOIN data_flow_last_modified_by data_2 ON data_1.id = data_2.id ) SELECT cu.* FROM cte_user cu INNER JOIN user_subject_relation usr ON cu.id = usr.user_id INNER JOIN subject s ON s.id = usr.subject_id WHERE usr.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND usr.active_flag = 1 AND usr.delete_flag = 0 AND s.active_flag = 1 AND s.delete_flag = 0 AND ( cu.student_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.birthday LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.fullname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.grade LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.gender LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) -- filter ORDER BY ${meta.sortBy} ${meta.sortType} LIMIT #{meta.limit} OFFSET #{meta.offSet}
